channel.title: Error in Beast Master Conclave
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Error in Beast Master Conclave" - Current entry uses UA material instead of original RAW

item.title: Re: Error in Beast Master Conclave
item.content:encoded: Fixed. Added separate pages for each version, though I can't add the revised beast master to the front page

item.title: Re: Error in Beast Master Conclave
item.content:encoded: RAW Ranger isnt even on Wikidot. See my latest post about it - I agree with you

item.title: Error in Beast Master Conclave
item.content:encoded: Currently the Beast Master Conclave contains the subclass feats of the Beast Conclave of the UA Variant Ranger; it should be reverted to the RAW version (and the Beast Conclave optionally put into a separate page).
